capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts houses, and in particular, I identify as a HOGWARTS alumna. The connection to the magical world is just so deep for me, you know? It's like my roots run all the way back to those castle walls.

I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts school of magic, and I think it's because of its rich history and values. The fact that the wood is affiliated with such an iconic place just adds to my enthusiasm - it feels like a part of me!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the name of the character who attends hogwarts?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Filch is actually the title of the school's administrator. That makes sense, given his role in keeping an eye on everyone and making sure we're following the rules. I'm pretty certain about this one, to be honest. It's not like it's a topic of debate or anything.

I'm not a fan of the way the Filch is treated in our school. I mean, he's just trying to do his job as an administrator, but nobody gives him any respect. He's always getting blamed for things that aren't even his fault, and it's really unfair.
capsules_submitted.reply: that rings a bell. valeria mentioned that filch is the title administrator.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. I mean, it's not just a mode of transportation for him, but also a status symbol and a reflection of his personality. He takes great care of that vehicle, and it shows in the way he always makes sure it's clean and well-maintained.
